PropFirm.title: PropFirm
PropFirm.description: Represents a prop firm with its key attributes.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Prop Firm.

name.description: The name of the prop firm.

review.description: The review details of the prop firm.

yearsInBusiness.description: The number of years the prop firm has been in business.

maxAllocation.description: The maximum capital allocation offered by the prop firm (e.g., 200000).

platform.description: The primary trading platform used by the prop firm (e.g., Tradovate).

rules.description: A brief description of the rules of the prop firm.

referralLink.description: The referral link for the prop firm.

type.description: The type of the prop firm, e.g., 'forex' or 'futures'.

promoCode.description: The promo code associated with the prop firm.

title.description: The title of the blog post.

slug.description: The URL-friendly slug for the blog post.

content.description: The full content of the blog post in Markdown format.

author.description: The name of the post's author.

category.description: The category of the blog post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the post was last updated.

collections.description: Collection of blog posts for the website.
